content.question: A particle moves along the x-axis in such a way that its acceleration at time t for t ≥ 0 is given by a(t) = 4cos(2t). At time t = 0, the velocity of the particle is v(0) = 1 and its position is x(0) = 0. (a) Write an equation for the velocity v(t) of the particle.
